title: Drawing, "Christ in Glory with Angels", ca. 1630
medium: Brush and gray, white and light blue gouache on brown laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Crowd of angels surrounds the cross while floating amidst the clouds.  The cross, which is located on the right side of the composition, is being carried through the sky by two angels.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Christ in Glory with Angels", ca. 1630.
ca. 1630. Brush and gray, white and light blue gouache on brown laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7286.
